title: Loans disbursed by digital lender rises by 27% on year to reach Rs 37,676 crore, says FACE
description: Digital lenders have seen a 27% year-on-year growth in loan disbursements, reaching Rs 37,686 crore, according to data from the Fintech Association for Consumer Empowerment. Despite a slight seasonal decline, the number of loans grew by 15%, indicating strong demand for digital credit and its role in financial inclusion.
